title: SEX WITH MEDUSA
description: Kyle is a horny archeology professor on an expedition with his class in Greece to find the fabled ruins of Medusa, when he accidently falls upon an ancient maze and encounters the mythical being herself. He quickly discovers that she's more deadly, and loving, than any legend could have prepared him for.  *This erotica is from a males perspective, but can certainly be enjoyed by women readers too.  ***WARNING*** THIS STORY HAS EXPLICIT, HARDCORE SEX. Those looking for a tame romance erotica should avoid buying my book.  ***All characters in this book are of adult, consenting age. There is no snuff, underage, or non-consenting sex in this book.***  Other books by Tallia Ravejoy: RIDDEN BY THE GRIFFIN PRINCE HOOKED BY THE MERMAN FILLED BY THE HEADLESS HORSEMAN SEX SLAVE OF THE HYDRA FUTAS TASTED BY THE POLAR BEAR WARRIORS GIVEN TO THE DRAGON PRINCE HUNTED BY THE STAG KING
author: Tallia Ravejoy
